Name: Crazy indian
About the game: Welcome to Crazy Indian! The game is a 2D adventure platformer, discover an interesting world filled with traps! You will play as a mad Indian who, for unknown reasons, was on a strange island. And now you need to find a way out of this very island. Passing through location after location, you'll get closer to the finish line. That's just bad luck there are terrible monsters wandering around, as well as dangerous traps scattered throughout all the locations, which are better not to approach. Will you be able to find a way out of the island and still stay safe and unharmed? Features of the game: - beautiful levels - good soundtrack - unlock new levels
